creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
inscription:
Signatures, Inscriptions, and Seals

(Darkness over the imperial palace by the Gusui dissolves by itself); (The peak near the monastery on Sugaku clears up)
markings: seal UR first text: (Having traveled one thousand miles, I have not yet read ten thousand books); (Kashō); (Taigadō); seal UL: (Chikkyo deshi); LL: (Sessō) | seals second text, UR: (Having traveled one thousand miles, I have not yet read ten thousand books); (Kashō); (Taigadō); UL: (Chikkyo deshi); LL (illegible)
signed: first text signed: (Kashōsha); second text signed: (Kashōsha)
title: Two Calligraphies
